benefits.industry_1: Sabbin abubuwan ba da gudummawa don mahimmanci amma saboda haka ayyukan ci gaban magunguna marasa amfani.
benefits.industry_2: Dama don taimakawa marasa galihu marasa lafiya ba tare da lalata kansu ko wadancan marasa lafiya ta hanyar kudade ba.
benefits.patients_2: Yankan magunguna masu tsattsauran ra'ayi a farashi mai araha.
benefits.patients_3: Babban dama cewa za a bai wa marasa lafiya magungunan da suka fi dacewa da su.
benefits.show_more_1: A halin yanzu an kirkiro masu kirkiro wadanda zasu iya samarda irin wadancan magungunan wadanda akwai matukar bukatar kasuwa daga masu karamin karfi. Asalin bunkasa rayuwar da lafiyar duk bil adama daidai, Asusun Tasirin Lafiya zai iya bayarda kyawawan lada don samar da sabbin magunguna koda wadannan sun cika bukatun mafi yawan marassa lafiya.
benefits.show_more_2: Tsarin yanzu shine ke sa masu ƙirƙirar magunguna su sami duk ribar da suke samu daga abubuwan talla. Asusun Tallafawar Kiwon Lafiya zai basu ƙarin zaɓi na tallata wasu sabbin magunguna waɗanda ribar da take samu ta hanyar cimma burin samun lafiya. Rijista don ladan tasiri na kiwon lafiya, irin waɗannan magunguna dole ne a sayar da su ba tare da alamun tallafi ba - aƙalla farashin masana'antu da rarrabawa - a cikin duk gudummawa da kuma a duk ƙasashe masu ƙasƙanci da ƙananan.
benefits.show_more_3: Ka yi tunanin magani wanda aka samar da shi na $ 20 kuma an sayar da shi kan $ 50,000. Irin waɗannan alamomin rashin daidaituwa na yau da kullun ne a cikin tsarin yanzu, inda kamfanoni dole ne su dogara da alamun tallafi don biyan manyan kuɗaɗen ci gaba na bincike da ci gaba. Irin waɗannan manyan lambobin suna ba wa masu riƙe izini tabbataccen ƙarfin ƙarfafawa don inganta tallace-tallace. Wadannan abubuwan ba da gudummawa suna haifar da cin zarafin da yawa waɗanda suke da wuyar dakatarwa; kuma da yawa daga cikin marasa lafiya saboda haka ba sa samun maganin da ya fi dacewa da su. Tare da ladan tasiri na kiwon lafiya, ta bambanta, ribar yana da nasaba da nasarar warkewa; don haka kamfanoni basa samun komai ta hanyar sanya kayan aikin su ga marasa lafiyar da basu amfana da hakan ba.
benefits.state_1: Ba da gudummawa don gano burin cimma buri na Duniya.
benefits.state_2: Inganta ingantaccen aiki a fannin kiwon lafiya.
benefits.state_3: Rage hatsarori daga cututtukan kafirai na talakawa.
benefits.state_5: Rage nauyin tattalin arziki daga cuta.
benefits.state_6: Yana samun ilimi a cikin ilimin cututtukan cututtukan cututtukan cututtukan da ake buƙata daga lafiyar kimar da ake buƙata.
benefits.state_7: Gaskiya hadin gwiwar Arewa da Kudu don samar da kayan jama'a.
benefits.state_8: Kafa sabuwar bidi'a mai sauyi a cikin inganta sababbin abubuwa

Ya nuna cewa Asusun Tasirin Lafiya yana da yuwuwu kuma zai samar da fa'idodi mai yawa ga lafiyar jama'a da haɓaka tattalin arziƙin a cikin ɗan ƙaramin rahusa.

faq.heading: Tambayoyi akai-akai
faq.q1: Shin Asusun Tasirin Lafiya ya maye gurbin tsarin karfafawa ne?
faq.q1_answer: A bayyane: a'a. Incarin abubuwan arfafawa daga alamomin kariya da izinin mallaka suka kasance a wurin. Asusun Tallafawar Lafiya ya ba masu kirkirar magunguna ƙarin zaɓi na yin rajistar sabon magani sannan kuma suna karɓar lada gwargwadon tasiri na kiwon lafiya.
faq.q2: Ta yaya ake tallafawa Asusun Tallafawar Lafiya?
faq.q2_answer: Jihohi na iya samun kuɗin Asusun Kula da Lafiya ta hanyar jihohi, galibi gwargwadon aikinsu na alfarmar ƙasar. Wata hanyar samar da kudade kuwa ita ce haraji na kasa da kasa da za a iya sanyawa a fitar da iskar gas, a ce, ko kuma a wani cikas ga ma'amala ta kasuwanci.
faq.q3: Nawa ne kudin Asusun Tallafawar Lafiya ke buƙata?
faq.q3_answer: Don samun damar isa ga yawan adadin samfuran, Asusun Tasirin Lafiya yana buƙatar samun kuɗaɗe a ƙalla Euro biliyan 3 a shekara. Tabbas, Hakanan zai iya aiki tare da manyan wuraren ninkaya na shekara-shekara sannan kuma zai iya jawo yawan adadin yawan samfur ɗin.
faq.q4_answer: A bayyane: Ee. Yuro biliyan 3 a kowace shekara kasa da 0.3% na abin da duniya ke bayarwa a halin yanzu game da magunguna. Idan duk ƙasashe suka halarci, to kowannensu zai buƙaci bayar da gudummawa kawai 0.0036% na babban abin da ƙasar ta samu zuwa Asusun Tallafawar Kiwon Lafiya. Kuma waɗannan gudummawar za a kashe su ta hanyar tanadi mai yawa ta hanyar rage yawan kashe kuɗaɗen magunguna.
faq.q5: Me zai hana idan wasu ƙasashe masu arzikin da farko ba sa son bayar da gudummawarsu?
faq.q5_answer: Haramcin su yana da wasu tasirin sakamako kuma: magungunan da suka yi rijista tare da Asusun Kula da Lafiya na Lafiya har yanzu ana iya siyar da su tare da manyan alamomin kariya ta mallaka a duk ƙasashe masu ba da gudummawa. Wannan damar za ta kara kyau ga kamfanonin harhada magunguna don yin rajistar wani sabon magani sannan kuma zai ba jihohin da ba su bayar da gudummawa su shiga tsarin Asusun Tallafawar Lafiya.
faq.q6: Ta yaya Asusun Tallafawar Lafiya zai ba da gudummawar masu ƙirƙirar magunguna?
faq.q6_answer: Masu kirkirar magunguna na iya yin rijistar kowane sabon samfuri tare da Asusun Kula da Lafiya sannan a sami biyan lada na shekara-shekara wanda aka keɓaɓɓe da nasarorin da aka samu na kiwon lafiya: mafi girman gudummawar kayan samfuri don rage nauyin cutar, mafi girman ladan biyan. Samfurin da aka yi rijista yana da lada a cikin shekarunsa na farko.
faq.q7: Kuma ta yaya ake auna nasarorin kiwon lafiya?
faq.q7_answer: Ana auna ci gaban kiwon lafiya a cikin shekarun rayuwa masu daidaita-inganci (QALYs) kuma ana tantance su ta hanyar samfuran ƙididdiga.
faq.q8: Menene shekaru gyara da aka gyara?
faq.q8_answer: Hanyar ingantacciyar rayuwar shekaru tayi amfani da ita kimanin shekaru 30. Ayan shekara ɗaya na ingantacciyar rayuwa na iya zama, alal misali, ƙarin shekara guda na cikakken rayuwa mai lafiya wanda mai haƙuri ya samu. Ko kuma zai iya zama riba na shekaru biyu cikin rashin talauci (50%). Ko kuma hakan na iya kasancewa ba za a iya tsawaita rayuwa ba kwata-kwata, sai dai a samu ci gaba a kiwon lafiya kawai - kamar lokacin da magani yake kare wata cuta na shekaru hudu da zai rage lafiyar mara lafiya daga 100% zuwa 75%; wannan ribar lafiya ta ninki sau hudu 25% shima yana kirgawa ajiyar rayuwa shekara ingantacciya.
faq.q9: Yaya shekaru masu daidaita rayuwa suka shafi rarraba ayyukan lada?
faq.q9_answer: Kowace shekara, Asusun Tasirin Lafiya yana ƙididdige rayuwar shekaru masu daidaita rayuwar da kowane magani ya yi rajista. Dangane da waɗannan ƙididdigar, ƙayyadaddun lada na shekara shekara sannan an raba shi tsakanin samfuran rajista. Don haka idan a cikin wani shekara da aka bayar, wasu magunguna sun cimma kaso 10% na nasarorin lafiyar da dukkanin magunguna suka yi rijista da Asusun Raunin Lafiya, to wannan ladan an ba shi ladan kashi 10% na wannan shekarar.
faq.q10: Shin manufar Asusun Tallafawar Kiwon Lafiya har yanzu tana kan takarda ne kawai?
faq.q10_answer: A'a. Tuni akwai wani aikin bincike na shekaru 5 kan auna nasarorin kiwon lafiya, wanda ya haɗa da aikin filin a Indiya kuma yana samun tallafin Yuro miliyan biyu daga Kwamitin Binciken Turai. Wannan aikin ya nuna yadda za'a iya tantance tasirin warkewa har ma a yankuna mafi talauci.
faq.q11: Ta yaya za a sami Asusun Kula da Lafiya na siyasa ta hanyar siyasa?
faq.q11_answer: Muna neman goyon baya ga wani aikin jirgi. Manufarta ita ce a gwada ainihin abubuwan Asusun Tallafawar Lafiya a kan karami - alal misali, tare da lada guda na Euro miliyan 100. Za a gayyaci masu kirkirar magunguna kowannensu da su gabatar da wani sabon shiri, wanda ya shafi magungunan da suka riga suka mallaka, don cimma burin da aka samu na kiwon lafiya a wasu yankuna na duniya. Kwamitin kwararru ne zai zabi hudu daga cikin wadannan shawarwari kuma ya basu shekaru uku don aiwatarwa. A karshen wannan lokacin, za a rarraba wuraren bayar da ladan gwargwadon nasarorin lafiyar da aka samu.
faq.q12: Wadanne abubuwa ne masu kirkirar kirki zasu gabatar da wannan sabon matukin jirgi?
faq.q12_answer: Mahimmanci zaɓi na zaɓaɓɓu zai zama girman da ma'aunin abubuwan da ake fatan samuwar kiwon lafiya har ma da damar samar da ƙira da kuma haɗawar talakawa. Masu kirkirar magunguna na iya ba da shawara, alal misali, don inganta yanayin zafi ko na yara na ɗayan magungunan su, ko ƙirar sabuwar samfurin takamaiman magani ko ƙaddamar da maganin cututtukan da suka dace da tsaunukan. Makasudin matukin jirgin shine ya nuna cewa za a iya dogaro da nasarorin lafiya kuma a auna su akai-akai. Hakanan zai nuna irin ƙarin tasirin kiwon lafiyar ta hanyar irin waɗannan sabbin abubuwan ƙarfafawa. Muna fatan cewa, tare da taimakon jihohi, tushe da sauran su, ana iya aiwatar da irin wannan babban aikin matukan jirgi.

how.background_1: A halin yanzu ana samun kuɗaɗen bincike na kantin magani daga abubuwan bada-kariya.
how.background_1_answer: Haɓaka sababbin magunguna yana da tsada sosai. Don rufe waɗannan farashin R&D, jihohi suna ba da lasisi na shekaru 20. A karkashin kariyar irin wadannan kamfanonin kera na wucin gadi, kamfanonin kera magunguna na iya siyar da sabbin kayayyakin su a farashi mai matukar tsada. Wannan tsarin yana da sakamako masu illa biyu:
how.background_2_answer: A cikin tsarin yanzu, cututtukan da aka tattara a tsakanin talakawa basu da kulawa ga binciken magunguna. Wannan ya faru ne saboda marassa lafiyar marasa ikon iya sayan magunguna masu tsada. Saboda haka ana yin watsi da cututtukan su. Masu kirkirar magunguna sun fi neman magunguna game da asarar gashi fiye da magunguna game da cututtukan da ke haifar da talauci, kamar su dengue, leishmaniasis ko Ebola.
how.background_3: Babban farashin yana hana damar zuwa sababbin magunguna:
how.background_3_answer: Sabbin magunguna ba za su iya biyan talakawa ba. Ko da lokacin da aka haɓaka sababbin magunguna, alal misali a kan cutar hepatitis C, ana sayar da su koyaushe a farashi mai hauhawar riba wanda ya wuce abin da yawancin masu haƙuri ke iyawa. Hakanan yana ɗaukar magunguna game da cututtukan duniya kamar su kansa.
how.background_4: Asusun Tasirin Lafiya yana samar da tsarin haɗin gwiwa wanda ke ƙarfafa lafiyar duniya.
how.background_4_answer: Tare da Asusun Tasirin Lafiya, kamfanonin samar da magunguna suna samun ƙarin zaɓi wanda, ta hanyar sababbin abubuwan ƙarfafawa, rage waɗannan tasirin biyu masu illa.
how.essence_1: Kiwon lafiya ya sami matsayin ka’ida.
how.essence_1_answer: Dalilin magunguna shine haɓakawa da kiyaye lafiya. Asusun Tallafawar Kiwon Lafiya yana daidaita abubuwan tallata kamfanoni don shiga cikin bincike, ci gaba da siyarwa tare da ainihin wannan manufar ta zamantakewar jama'a: yayin da mafi yawan magungunan da aka yiwa rijista suka tsawwala ko inganta rayuwar dan adam, mafi girman shine ladan da mai kirkirar sa ya samu daga Asusun Tallafawar Lafiya. A cikin wannan kashin, ana kimanta lafiyar mutane baki daya daidai da komai, ko da masu arziki ne ko matalauta.
how.essence_2_answer: Tare da tallafin da jama'a ke bayarwa wanda asusun Tallafin Lafiya na Lafiya yake bayarwa ga magunguna masu rijista, masu kirkirar kirki zasu iya biyan farashin su kuma su samu kudin shiga na gasa Matsakaici. Kamar yadda yake kan tsarin na yanzu, masu kirkirar kirki suna daukar hadari. Bincike na iya haifar da magani mai mahimmanci na warkewa wanda ke taimaka wa marasa lafiya da yawa. Idan kuwa bai samu ba, mai kirkirar mai amfani zai iya samun kadan saboda kokarinsa ko kuma komai.
how.essence_3: Jin daɗin farashin magani daga farashin R&D.
how.essence_3_answer: Dole ne a sayar da magunguna masu rijista a kan farashin da ba ya wuce farashin kaya da rarrabawa. Irin waɗannan magunguna suna da arha har ma da matalauta marasa lafiya.
how.in_short: Asusun Tallafawar Lafiya a cikin 'yan jimloli.
how.in_short_1_answer: Tallafin ta hanyar jihohi, tushe na taimako ko haraji na kasa da kasa, Asusun Tasirin Lafiya zai ba masu kirkirar magunguna damar yin rajistar kowane sabon samfurin don biyan ladan shekara.
how.in_short_2: Gudanar da farashin don tallafawa samun dama:
how.in_short_2_answer: Farashin samfurori masu rijista yana iyakance ne akan farashin samarwa da rarrabawa, sabili da haka mai araha ko da marassa lafiya ne. Farashin magungunan da aka yi wa rijista ya ragu daga farashin R&D.
how.in_short_3: Biyan lada mai gasa gwargwadon aikin:
how.in_short_3_answer: Sakamakon bayar da lada ga masu kirkirar magunguna ya ta'allaka ne kan nasarorin kiwon lafiya na shekara-shekara da suka samu ta hanyar magungunan da suka yi rajista. Idan aka sami irin wannan sabon magani na inganta rayuwar mutum ko ya tsawaita rayuwarsa, to yawan kudin da mai kera ke samu.
how.in_short_intro: Asusun Tallafawar Kiwon Lafiya yana ba da tsarin haɗin gwiwa don haɓaka sababbin magunguna - musamman waɗanda aka yi niyya ga marassa lafiyar waɗanda ba za su iya biyan magunguna masu tsada ba.

intro.benefits_government_heading: Fa'idodi ga Gwamnatoci da Masu Biyan Haraji.
intro.benefits_government_text: Asusun Tallafawar Kiwon Lafiya zai rage nauyin mutum, zamantakewa da tattalin arziƙin cutar ta hanyar haɓaka ƙimar kashe kuɗaɗen kashe magunguna.
intro.benefits_innovators_text: Asusun Tasirin Lafiya zai iya ƙara yawan gudummawar ɓangaren pharma ga lafiyar ɗan adam ta hanyar ba shi riba don magance ƙarin wuraren cutar da yawan masu haƙuri.
intro.benefits_patients_text: Asusun Tasirin Lafiya zai fadada hanyoyin samun magunguna, inganta hanyoyin samun magunguna da rage hatsarin kurakuran likita.
intro.book_heading: Asusun Tallafawar Lafiya ya cika ƙa'idodin da ke gudana waɗanda ke jagorantar ci gaba da rarraba sababbin magunguna.
intro.book_text: Karanta a wannan littafin yadda Asirin Tasirin Lafiya ke kasancewa mai yiwuwa kuma zai samar da babban sakamako ga lafiyar jama'a da haɓakar tattalin arziƙin na duniya da ƙarancin kuzari.
intro.donate_text: Align kasuwannin magunguna tare da bukatun lafiyar mutum. Ba da gudummawa don tallafawa manufarmu
intro.hif_description: Kamar yadda aka tsara a halin yanzu, kasuwannin magunguna suna da asali mara kyau wanda yafi rinjayar talakawa: haɓaka sabbin magunguna ana samun kuɗaɗen kuɗaɗen ta hanyar alamomin da ke ba da izini. Wannan aibi yana haifar da watsi da bincike game da cututtukan da aka tattara a tsakanin talakawa. Yana hana talakawa damar samun magungunan da suka mallaka ko da kuwa za'a iya samar da wadataccen a cikin sauki. Kuma yana ƙarfafa jiyya mafi kyawu tare da magunguna waɗanda ke samun alamun farashi sama da waɗanda suka fi dacewa ga masu haƙuri. Asusun Tallafawar Lafiya zai ƙirƙiri kayan haɗin gwiwa wanda ke rage farashin magunguna daga ƙayyadaddun farashin ƙira kuma zai iya rufe ƙarshen ta hanyar sakamako mai tasiri na kiwon lafiya.
intro.hif_tagline: Delink farashin magungunan daga farashin bincike.
intro.how_text: Ta yaya Asusun Tasirin Kiwon Lafiya ya tabbatar da cewa bincike mai inganci na iya wadatar da tattalin arziki?
intro.pilot_heading: Muhimmin mataki na farko shine Pilot Asusun Tallafawar Lafiya.
intro.pilot_read_pilot: Binciko Matukin Jirgin Sama na Asusun Lafiya
intro.pilot_text: An dauki hoton matukin jirgi a matsayin wani shiri na shekaru biyar wanda zai samarda masu kirkirar magunguna suyi gasa tare da wani katafaren wurin lada. Za a rarraba kudin tsakanin kungiyoyin da ke cikin raunin ne bisa la’akari da nasarorin kiwon lafiya da kowa zai samu ta hanyar gabatar da magani ga kasa mai karamin karfi ko kuma inda ba a samu ba.
intro.quote_jami_text: Tare da isasshen kudade, Asusun Tallafawar Kiwon Lafiya na iya zama ingantacciyar hanyar ƙarfafa saka hannun jari daga ƙanana da manyan kamfanonin samar da magunguna don magance bukatun jama'ar da ke fama da ƙarancin shiga. Wannan zai iya daidaita manufofin kasuwanci tare da burin zamantakewa na rage wuce haddi da mace-mace. Zai iya tallafawa kamfanoni, ciki har da Janssen, a cikin ƙoƙarinsu na haɓaka samfurori masu tasowa a cikin gasa, tsarin tushen kasuwa wanda ke ba da sakamakon.
intro.quote_norway_text: Ya kamata a kafa asusun Asusun Lafiya na Duniya (HIF) azaman ƙari ga tsarin lamban kira na yanzu. Ta hanyar kamfanonin harhada magungunan Lafiya na kamfani na iya yin rajistar magunguna da son rai kuma sun himmatu wajen samar da su a mafi ƙanƙanci a kan biyan tallafi sama da shekaru goma daga Asusun bisa mahimman tasirin kiwon lafiya da ƙwayoyin su ke da shi. Wannan yana ba kamfanoni kwarin gwiwa don haɓaka magunguna ga waɗanda ke da mafi yawan bukatun kiwon lafiya kuma ba kawai waɗanda ke da ikon siye mafi girma ba.
intro.quote_tom_text: Shirin Asusun Tallafawar Lafiya yana da inganci kuma a kan kari. Akwai bayyananniyar buƙata don ƙarfafawa don ƙirƙirar magunguna tare da babban tasiri na lafiyar duniya da tabbatar da yaduwar su da wadatar su. Ya kamata hanyar da ta dace da kasuwa, wacce ba ta bukatar canje-canje iri-iri zuwa dokokin kasa da kasa na ilimi, na kasa da kasa, yakamata a samu karbuwa daga masu ba da gudummawa da mahalarta masana'antu.
intro.step_01: Asusun Tallafawar Lafiya yana raba kowace shekara ajiyayyen kuɗi na lada wanda jihohi, haraji na ƙasa da / ko masu ba da sadaka suke bayarwa.
intro.step_02: Masu kirkirar magunguna suna yin rijistar wasu sabbin kayayyaki tare da Asusun Tallafawar Lafiya - galibi waɗanda ba za su iya ci gaba ba - kuma da haka su yi alƙawarin sayar da su a farashin da bai fi farashin masana'anta da rarrabawa ba.
intro.step_03: Asusun Tallafawar Lafiya ya kimanta magungunan da aka yiwa rajista da kuma matakan zuwa ga irin yadda suke tsawaita rayuwa da inganta lafiya. Yana ba da lada gwargwadon nasarar lafiyar da aka samu tare da su.
intro.step_04: Saboda ana sayar da magunguna tare da Asusun Tallafawar Lafiya ba tare da wani tallafi ba, suna iya samar da fa'idodi na kiwon lafiya ko da a cikin talakawa. Asashe masu ƙarfi waɗanda ke ba da gudummawa ga Asusun Tallafawar Lafiya suna jin daɗin ƙananan farashi ɗaya. Haka kuma, duk marasa lafiya suna amfana yayin da aka biya masu kirkirar kirki bawai don siyar da irin waɗannan magunguna ba amma gwargwadon fa'idodin warkewa.
intro.step_05: Ba za mu iya yi ba tare da taimakonka! Muna fatan za kuyi aiki tare da mu wajen sakewa da aiwatar da manufar Asusun Tallafin Lafiya don sabbin magunguna na iya amfanar da gaske.
intro.what_text: Asusun Tallafawar Kiwon Lafiya yana ba da ingantaccen tsarin biyan kuɗi don aiwatarwa wanda ke ba da sabbin magunguna dangane da ainihin tasirin kiwon lafiya.
intro.why_text: Yawancin cututtukan da ke mutuwa a duniya baki daya ana haifar da talauci - talakawa ba su iya wadatar magunguna da suka dace.

news.2019.06.20_body: A ranar 20 ga Yuni na 2019, manyan masu ruwa da tsaki sun halarci taro kan shirin Asusun Tallafi na Kiwon Lafiya, shawarar MVAC, da ladar shigar kasuwa. Wadannan hanyoyin da sauran hanyoyin hadin gwiwa don tallafawa kirkirar kimiyya sun nuna mahimmancin sabbin kayan aikin bada kudi domin kirkirar magunguna ta fannoni daban-daban. Rt Hon Gordon Brown ya ba da ra'ayoyi masu ban takaici game da kalubalen jawo tallafin siyasa a cikin yanayin da muke ciki.
news.2019.06.20_title: Taron London kan Asusun Kula da Lafiya tare da Rt Hon Gordon Brown
news.2019.09.25_body: A yanzu haka Laborungiyar Kwadago ta Burtaniya tana kira da a canza canjin yadda muke biyan magunguna, don haka farashin ya “ƙare” daga farashin kerawa. Asusun Tallafawar Kiwon Lafiya wani yanki ne na musamman, mai cike da sassauci wanda ke sarrafa lada ga masu kirkiro ta hanyar kayan kasuwa.

news.2019.11.13_body: Asusun Lafiya Tasirin Lafiya shine taken wani muhimmin taro a Berlin ranar 13 ga Nuwamba. Haidemarie Wieczorek-Zeul (tsohon Ministan Tarayyar Turai na hadin gwiwar tattalin arziki da ci gaba) da Farfesa Thomas Pogge na Jami'ar Yale, taron ya tattara kwararru daga gwamnati , masana'antu, ƙungiyoyin jama'a, tushe, da ilimin kimiyya. Adgiitly karkashin jagorancin Sergius Seebohm, mahalarta sun bincika Asusun Tasirin Lafiya da yadda za a motsa matukin jirgi gaba. Akwai babban yarjejeniya cewa Asusun Tasirin Kiwon Lafiya ya ba da wata hanyar daidaitawa game da buƙatar tallafawa ƙirƙirar kirki da kuma buƙatar sabbin magunguna don samun damar ko'ina.

news.2020.02.02_body: Muna bakin ciki da wucewar Leila Janah, daya daga cikin wadanda suka kafa {intl_igh}. Ta kasance kyakkyawa, kirki da son ci gaban duniyarmu. Leila ta taimaka wajen haɓaka manufar Asusun Tallafawar Kiwon Lafiya gabaɗaya da azanci. 'Yar kasuwa mai taimakon al'umma, ta kafa {intl_samasource}, kamfanin da aka kirkiro don ba wa mutane talauci damar yin aiki kai tsaye a cikin ayyukan kwamfuta a Afirka da Indiya. Kamfanin ya samar da ayyukan yi mai kyau ga mutane sama da 11,000. Ta kuma kirkiro da kamfanin samarda kayayyakin kwalliya na LXMI wanda ke samar da kayayyaki masu dorewa daga Afirka, yayin da suke biyan mata ma'aikata daidai aikinsu. {intl_breaking_line} Dan adamtaka, mai kirkirar kirki, kuma mai kirki wanda ya fitar da mafi kyawun mutane, Leila za a rasa shi sosai. Samasource ya gayyaci wadanda ke son girmama Leila don bayar da gudummawa ga {intl_givework_challenge}.

problem.p1: Cututtukan da talakawa ke fama da shi ba makasudin kashe kuɗi ba ne ga kamfanonin magunguna, waɗanda ke samun fa'idodi mai kyau daga magungunan da ke maganin cututtukan mawadata. Akwai 'yan kaɗan ko ma babu kyawawan zaɓuɓɓukan magani na cututtukan cututtuka kamar malaria, tarin fuka, schistosomiasis, leishmaniasis, dengue ko Ebola, duk da cewa waɗannan cututtuka suna shafar miliyoyin.
problem.p2: Sabbin magunguna sau da yawa suna siyarwa a farashin da yawancin mutane ba sa iyawa. Wannan matsalar tana kawo damuwa ne saboda farashin masana'antu na yau da kullun yayi kadan. Firdausi na iya cajin abubuwa da yawa saboda abubuwan mallakarsu na kare su daga gasa. Samun kamfanonin da zasu iya yin caji sosai don sabbin magunguna galibi ana samun barata ne ta hanyar karfafa irin waɗannan kamfanonin don yin babban haɗari da tsadar ci gaban magunguna. Kodayake, yana da wuya a yarda cewa mutane da yawa suna wahala kuma suna mutuwa saboda rashin samun magungunan da za a iya samar da kayan masarufi cikin arha.
problem.p3: Muna buƙatar ingantacciyar hanyar biya don kerawa, ingantacciyar hanyar samar da kwarin gwiwa don magance cututtukan da aka tattara a cikin matalauta kuma suna rage farashin sabbin magunguna daga ƙayyadaddun farashin bincike da ci gaba.

Yana da alhakin jagorancin Incentives for Global Health (IGH), tare da haɗin gwiwar ƙungiyar zartarwa. Ya haɗu da IGH kuma ya haɗu da Tsarin Asusun Tallafawar Lafiya.

Ya yi karatun Laurea, summa cum laude, a adabi da Falsafa daga Jami'ar Milan (Italiya), sannan yana da Digirin Digirgir a Tarihi daga Jami'ar Eastern Piedmont (Vercelli, Italiya). Ta kammala digirin digirinta na Dokoki da Fasaha a Jami'ar Bologna tare da yin rubuce-rubuce kan takaddar mallakar fasaha da dokar kasa da kasa (haƙƙin ɗan Adam da haƙƙin kiwon lafiya - Samun magunguna azaman matsalar adalci ta duniya). what.how_answer: Jihohin da ke tattare da Asusun Kula da Lafiya zai samar da kuɗin tallafin ta hanyar jihohi da tushe na taimako. Zai ba masu kirkirar magunguna damar zabar kowane sabon kaya don biyan ladan shekara.
what.intro: Asusun Tallafawar Lafiya yana da niyyar samar da wani tsari na haɗin kai don haɓaka sababbin magunguna - musamman waɗanda aka yi niyya ga marassa lafiyar waɗanda ba za su iya biyan magunguna masu tsada ba.
what.prices_answer: Lokacin da aka yi rijistar magani tare da Asusun Kula da Lafiya, farashinsa ya ragu daga farashin R&D. Koda marasa lafiya marasa ƙarfi suna iya wadatar da irin waɗannan magunguna saboda farashinsu yana iyakance ga farashin ƙera da rarraba. Hanya guda daya ta tantance wannan madaidaicin farashin shine ta hanyar gasa tsakanin abokan masana'anta.
what.prices_see_more: Irin wannan gasa na iya ɗaukar nau'i na taushi wanda masana'antun ke yin gasa don samar da wadatar kayan samfurin da aka rajista a madadin mai rijista. Bayan haka, masana'antun da suka dace suna iya karɓar lasisi na kyauta don samarwa da samarwa samfurin da aka yiwa rajista yayin takara tare da juna a kasuwa. Inda babu ɗayan waɗannan zaɓuɓɓuka don aiki don tabbatar da wadatar mai wadata kuma mai araha, Asusun Kula da Lafiya na wouldungiyar zai saita babban farashi bisa ƙididdigar injiniya na ƙirar masana'antu da rarrabawa.
what.reward_answer: Sakamakon lada da masu kirkirar magunguna suka samu ya dogara ne kawai da nasarorin lafiyar da ake samu na shekara-shekara wanda magungunan da suka yi rajista suka samu. Idan aka sami irin wannan sabon magani na inganta rayuwar mutum ko ya tsawaita rayuwarsa, to yawan kudin zai kasance ga mai kirkirar shi.
what.reward_see_more: Wani muhimmin fasali na Asusun Tallafawar Lafiya shine cewa kowane wuraren shakatawa na shekara-shekara an sanya shi a gaba. Wannan yana taimaka wa Asusun da masu sa hannun shi don tafiyar da kasafin su. Kowace wurin ruwa an rarrabu gwargwadon nasarorin kiwon lafiya waɗanda samfuran rijista suka samu a cikin shekarar da ta dace. Don haka kamfanoni ke yin gasa don inganta lafiyar mutum. Kowane samfurin da aka yiwa rijista ya shiga cikin biyan kuɗi na tsawan shekaru goma, wanda yayi kama da tsawon lokacin aikin da kamfanonin ke morewa yanzu a ƙarƙashin ikon mallakar. A ƙarshen wannan lokacin sakamako, ana buƙatar mai ƙirƙira don yin lasisin samfuran da ke rajista don samin samfuran jama'a, ba tare da la'akari da kowane lasisi da bai cika ba.
